name: Animals Matching Game Free
description:
Keep you and your kids entertained with this cute-graphics animal memory match game.
This game will keep your kids entertained, while developing their concentration, memory and cognitive skills.
Kids will play it again again and again, giving you a well deserved rest or break when your're in a restaurant, on a plane o in a car.

1 year old kids will be able to play, and 2-5 year olds they will just love it.

Tap to discover which animal is hiding behind the card, find the same pair of animals to make them disappear.
But hurry up! Time is ticking.
Have fun playing with your kids and for the price of a soda they'll develop their memorization and concentration skills.
Endless fun with three game modes:
- Easy: find matching pairs in a 4x3 board
- Medium: find matching pairs in a 4x4 board
- Hard: find matching pairs in a 5x4 board.
